name: Oregon Breakthrough Classroom Behavior Management Strategies
content: This conference delivers hundreds of innovative mental health, social and behavioral intervention strategies for ADD, ADHD, Asperger's, difficult, troubled, distressed, failing, at-risk, defiant youth, emotionally disturbed children, and teens from troubled families. College credit and free CEUs, plus distance class available. Try these innovative mental health, social, and behavior and discipline strategies free at website: http://www.youthchg.com. Info: dwells@youthchg.com, 800-545-5736\. Financial aid offered. Seattle, WA: May 4-5, 2017 Portland, OR: Oct. 12-13, 2017 Online, webinar, and on-site presentations available More Course Details at https://www.youthchg.com/teacher-workshops/ Register Online at https://www.youthchg.com/teacher-workshops/ Workshop Flyer Online at http://www.youthchg.com/flyf06all4pages.pdf
